long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snes9X is a portable Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) emulator.
It basically allows you to play most games designed for the SNES and Super Famicom Nintendo game systems on your Google(TM) Chrome OS, Chrome OS Flex devices. 
The games include some real gems that were only ever released in Japan.

You will need access to SNES ROM images otherwise you will have nothing to run!
Please note, it is illegal in most countries to have commercial ROM images without also owning the actual SNES ROM cartridges.

CHANGELOG
- Added support for gamepad (One device only) [Tested gamepads: Google(TM) Stadia, Microsoft(R) Xbox, SONY(R) Playstation].
- Added Added help section.
- Added import cheats from CHT file.
- Added sync/reset settings.
- Added emulation of SNES mouse, superscope and justifier controllers.
- Added multiplayer support up to two players.
- Added mantain 4:3 aspect ratio.
- Added video filters.
- Added toggle fullscreen for all resolutions.
- Added save game.
- Added recent ROMs menu [Max. 100 ROMs].
- Added load ROMs from ZIP file.
